children.html:
For this week’s Switch Kickstarter Project, we are going to be highlighting the Pro Ergonomic Grips for Nintendo Switch.

These Pro Ergonomic Grips are designed to replicate the feeling of a regular controller when either playing in handheld mode or when you’re playing with the Joy-Cons detached.

The project requires AU$4,182 to be funded and it is currently sitting at AU$1,111 with 32 days remaining. The project is expected to ship in March 2019.

Click here to check out the Kickstarter page…

 

What do you think of the Pro Ergonomic Grips for Nintendo Switch? Will you be backing this project? Let us know in the Comments section below.

Be sure to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @switchaboonews for more on Nintendo Switch. And hey, why not check out last week’s Switch Kickstarter Project of the week: Freja and the Lost Prophecy, which is currently sitting at just over 50% funded with 15 days to go?
